title: Refund Policy and Process
content:
We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all subscriptions. Here's how to request a refund:

1. Log into your account
2. Go to Settings > Billing
3. Click 'Request Refund' next to your subscription
4. Select the reason for your refund request
5. Provide any additional feedback (optional)
6. Submit the request

Refund Timeline:
- Requests are reviewed within 24 hours
- Approved refunds are processed within 3-5 business days
- Funds appear in your account within 5-10 business days depending on your bank

Eligibility:
- Within 30 days of purchase
- Account must be in good standing
- No previous refunds on the same subscription

Partial refunds are available for annual subscriptions based on unused months.
solutions: Use the self-service refund option in Settings > Billing
Contact support if past 30 days with special circumstances
Check refund status in your billing history
